name: The Adventure of Squishy II Demo
name_original: The Adventure of Squishy II Demo
description:
This is the demo of The Adventure of Squishy II, if you want updates on how the final version is coming, look in the devlog.

Arrow keys to move

Space to go through doors and on the world map (press space a lot)

Final game is a work in progress

When final game is released, uninstall the files from this
